greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = T(n-1,k-1) + n*T(n-2,k); T(0,0) = T(1,0) = T(1,1) = 1, T(n,k) = 0 if k>n or if k<0.
comment: Triangle A180048 mixed with triangle A180049.

Let p(n,x) be the polynomial whose coefficients are given by row n; e.g., p(2,x) = 2 + x + x^2; then p(n,x) is the numerator of the rational function given by f(n,x) = x + (n - 1)/f(n-1,x), where f(x,0) = 1.  (Sum of numbers in row n) = A000885(n) for n >= 1.  (Column 1) = A006882 (n-th term = n!! for n >= 0) - _Clark Kimberling_, Oct 19 2014
mathematica: (* Next, the polynomials *); z = 20; f[x_, n_] := x + n/f[x, n - 1]; f[x_, 0] = 1; t = Table[Factor[f[x, n]], {n, 0, z}]; u = Numerator[t]; TableForm[Rest[Table[CoefficientList[u[[n]], x], {n, 0, z}]]]  (* A249057 array *)
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Oct 28 2013
